title: Amulet of the Four Winds
data:
{{version030}} {{flavour|A pendant made of purest jade. It grants its wearer immense willpower and mental fortitude.}} [[File:Amulet_of_the_four_winds.png]] '''''the amulet of the Four Winds''''' [[Clarity]]
rN+
+120 [[willpower]] (Will+++)
==Desirability== The '''amulet of the Four Winds'''{{source ref|0.30.1|art-data.txt|1105}} provides all the [[willpower]] you'll ever need, allowing you to resist nasty Hexes like [[paralysis]] (and freeing up gear slots in the process). The other two intrinsics are nice to have, too. Clarity is especially helpful for [[Mummies]]. Unless you have amazing willpower ([[Spriggan]]s, having a [[randart]] with Will++/Will+++...), it's definitely worth keeping. At the least, it can be used as a swap for where willpower and/or clarity are helpful. ==History== *Prior to [[0.14]], the MR bonus was +100 instead of +120. ==References== [[Category:Unrands]] [[Category:Amulets]]
